reviewText:
Like one other reviewer said, the anime is too short.  The story is very underdeveloped. Maybe the idea was to consider creating a sequel to see what happens between the two after their love scene if this did well enough, but the dvd appears to have gone for regular price just like lgbt dvds in which the movies are 1.5 - 2 hours long.  Sometimes, simple is better, but not in this case.  The emotion has a rawness to it that seems to give it a reputation, but the rawness of it is forced as a story rather than naturally built in.  Some could even argue that this is borderline rape, and Mizuki shows hesitation and that he can be manipulated so easily.  For someone wanting to start off with seeing some of the basics in all its good rawness, this is a good short-ish movie to watch.  The pacing of the movie was fine, but then it needed more story development.  Otherwise, a very active story with lots of plot twists that somehow flow in a short amount of time could make this a quality story, but also be much harder to pull off with quality.  There is/was a band called Level C that maybe could help this movie out with more development even.

The combination of the short length with the forced interaction, and so little happening that is significant in the big picture is what leads me to give the rating that I have given it.
Great for a first time yaoi movie
I love the store, but I wish they would have done more. Overall it's a good read and since it's not a long series you could finish it easily.

It's very graphic regarding the love scenes.
If you like, it's for you.
If you don't like, it's not for you.
It is about true love between 2 men.

I had been looking for this anime for a good couple of years now so i was so excited when it finally arrived at my door. this is a brilliant first time yaoi anime for anyone new to the yaoi genre and also to those who just love those tender love stories between those lovely bishies
I loved it and the story is wonderful. It was a little short but very enjoyable to see. Enjoy
